channel.title: PI polypore staff rep++
channel.description:
Tried adding polypore staff so it attacks and doesn't require any runes, yet when i try it it says "you don't have enough runes"
I used this tut here : [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/snippets/401354-pi-adding-polypore-staff-317-a.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/snippets/401354-pi-adding-polypore-staff-317-a.html[/url]
Will rep++ i've been messing with this for a couple hours, still no solution, did everything in that tutorial above...Thanks!!

item.title: PI polypore staff rep++
item.dc:creator: @s_3_3_m_3 s 3 3 m 3
item.description:
@s_3_3_m_3 wrote:

Alright, don’t got any errors, but now when i go too attack with the staff it just does nothing, doesn’t even melee attack, looks like it wants too do something though.

And when you said change the if(!hasStaff(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][12])) {

did that go for all of them? because before i changed all of them i got like 3 errors which were…

source\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:75: hasStaff() in server.model. players.CombatAssistant cannot be applied to (int) if(!hasStaff(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][8])) { ^ source\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:80: hasStaff() in server.model. players.CombatAssistant cannot be applied to (int) if(!hasStaff(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][10])) { ^ source\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:90: hasStaff() in server.model. players.CombatAssistant cannot be applied to (int) if(!hasStaff(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][14])) { ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .
thanks

item.title: PI polypore staff rep++
item.dc:creator: @s_3_3_m_3 s 3 3 m 3
item.description:
@s_3_3_m_3 wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:2, topic:445727”]public void getSpellsRunes(int spell) { if(c.usingMagic && Config.RUNES_REQUIRED) { if(c.playerWeapon == 15486) { if(Misc.random((int)87.5) == 0) { c.sendMessage("Your spell draws its power completely from your staff."); return; } } if(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][8] > 0) { // deleting runes if(!hasStaff(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][8])) { c.getItems().deleteItem(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][8], c.getItems().getItemSlot(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][8]), c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][9]); } } if(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][10] > 0) { // deleting runes if(!hasStaff(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][10])) { c.getItems().deleteItem(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][10], c.getItems().getItemSlot(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][10]), c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][11]); } } if(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][12] > 0) { // deleting runes if(!hasStaff(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][12])) { c.getItems().deleteItem(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][12], c.getItems().getItemSlot(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][12]), c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][13]); } } if(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][14] > 0) { // deleting runes if(!hasStaff(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][14])) { c.getItems().deleteItem(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][14], c.getItems().getItemSlot(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][14]), c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][15]); } } } }

I would add something like this to the above code.

if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == POLYMORE_STAFF_ID){ return; }

And that’s all.[/quote]

Thanks

edit: source\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:75: cannot find symbol symbol : method hasStaff(int) location: class server.model.players.CombatAssistant if(!hasStaff(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][8])) { ^ source\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:80: cannot find symbol symbol : method hasStaff(int) location: class server.model.players.CombatAssistant if(!hasStaff(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][10])) { ^ source\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:85: cannot find symbol symbol : method hasStaff(int) location: class server.model.players.CombatAssistant if(!hasStaff(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][12])) { ^ source\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:90: cannot find symbol symbol : method hasStaff(int) location: class server.model.players.CombatAssistant if(!hasStaff(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][14])) { ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 4 errors Press any key to continue . . . :\

@AddictivePkz wrote:

Dont u read the comments before following a guide?..
Everybody said the guide is inaccurate and wont work… plus he only posted things u needed to do server sided… polypore staff image isnt even in the client… u gotta add the image and do some stuff client sided too.

Read full topic

item.title: PI polypore staff rep++
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

public void getSpellsRunes(int spell) { if(c.usingMagic && Config.RUNES_REQUIRED) { if(c.playerWeapon == 15486) { if(Misc.random((int)87.5) == 0) { c.sendMessage("Your spell draws its power completely from your staff."); return; } } if(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][8] > 0) { // deleting runes if(!hasStaff(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][8])) { c.getItems().deleteItem(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][8], c.getItems().getItemSlot(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][8]), c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][9]); } } if(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][10] > 0) { // deleting runes if(!hasStaff(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][10])) { c.getItems().deleteItem(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][10], c.getItems().getItemSlot(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][10]), c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][11]); } } if(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][12] > 0) { // deleting runes if(!hasStaff(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][12])) { c.getItems().deleteItem(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][12], c.getItems().getItemSlot(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][12]), c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][13]); } } if(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][14] > 0) { // deleting runes if(!hasStaff(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][14])) { c.getItems().deleteItem(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][14], c.getItems().getItemSlot(c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][14]), c.MAGIC_SPELLS[spell][15]); } } } }

I would add something like this to the above code.

if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == POLYMORE_STAFF_ID){ return; }

And that’s all.

Read full topic
